myserver
Class ConnectionManager

java.lang.Object
  myserver.ConnectionManager

public class ConnectionManager
extends java.lang.Object

Represents connection manager of the server object.

Nested Class Summary
 class ConnectionManager.Connection
          Represents single connection object of connection manager.

addConnection

public void addConnection(java.lang.String user,
                          ConnectionManager.Connection con)
Adds connection and user who logged in to map of connection and users of connection manager.

Parameters:
user - string representation of user's login.
con - Connection object representation of connection.

removeConnection

public void removeConnection(java.lang.String user)
Removes the connection from map of connections and users of connection manager. Removed by key - user's login.

Parameters:
user - string representation of user's login.
